summary: A humble cottage south of Whiterun. Made with crafting overhauls and basic needs systems in mind, this cottage has it all.
descriptionHtml:
A humble cottage south of Whiterun. Presumably the cottage was owned by the Dovahkiin before they were travelling south and arrested by the Imperials. Made with crafting overhauls and basic needs systems in mind, this cottage has it all.

The cottage includes all of the crafting accouterments, a forge, smelter, workbench, grindstone, tanning rack, chopping block, enchanting table, and alchemy set, as well as containers for the various divisions of crafting. 

1.0 - Initial Release.
1.1 Fixed teleport on exiting the house, spawning some people into the porch. Also improved NPC pathing around the house.
author: Sephyvaline
